methods.name: bootstrap
methods.desc: Anybody can deploy the clamm smart contract

args.name: txSeed
args.desc: Seed transaction so that smart contract can opt in to the assets

args.name: assetA
args.desc: Asset A ID must be lower then Asset B ID

args.name: assetB
args.desc: Asset B

args.name: verificationClass
args.desc: Asset B

methods.name: addLiquidity
methods.desc: This method adds Asset A and Asset B to the Automated Market Maker Concentrated Liqudidity Pool and send to the liqudidty provider the liqudity token

args.name: txAssetADeposit
args.desc: Transfer of asset A to the LP pool

args.name: txAssetBDeposit
args.desc: Transfer of asset B to the LP pool

args.name: assetLP
args.desc: Liquidity pool asset

args.name: assetA
args.desc: Asset A

args.name: assetB
args.desc: Asset B

methods.name: removeLiquidity
methods.desc: This method retrieves from the liquidity provider LP token and returns Asset A and Asset B from the Automated Market Maker Concentrated Liqudidity Pool

args.name: txLPXfer
args.desc: Transfer of the LP token

args.name: assetLP
args.desc: LP pool asset

args.name: assetA
args.desc: Asset A

args.name: assetB
args.desc: Asset B

methods.name: swap
methods.desc: Swap Asset A to Asset B or Asset B to Asst A

args.name: txSwap
args.desc: Transfer of the token to be deposited to the pool. To the owner the other asset will be sent.

args.name: assetA
args.desc: Asset A

args.name: assetB
args.desc: Asset B

args.name: minimumToReceive
args.desc: If number greater then zero, the check is performed for the output of the other asset

methods.name: calculateLiquidity
methods.desc: Calculates the liquidity  from the x - Asset A position and y - Asset B position

args.name: x
args.desc: Asset A position balanced on the curve

args.name: y
args.desc: Asset B position balanced on the curve

args.name: priceMin
args.desc: Minimum price variable in base scale decimals (pa)

args.name: priceMax
args.desc: Maximum price variable in base scale decimals (pb)

args.name: priceMinSqrt
args.desc: sqrt(priceMin) in base scale decimals Variable pas

args.name: priceMaxSqrt
args.desc: sqrt(priceMax) in base scale decimals Variable pbs

returns.desc: Liquidity is constant in swapping each direction. On deposit the diff between the liquidity is number of LP tokens received by user.

methods.name: calculatePrice
methods.desc: Get the current price when asset a has x

args.name: assetAQuantity
args.desc: x

args.name: assetBQuantity
args.desc: y

args.name: priceMinSqrt
args.desc: sqrt(priceMin)

args.name: priceMaxSqrt
args.desc: sqrt(priceMax)

args.name: liquidity
args.desc: Current pool liquidity - L variable

returns.desc: the price with specified quantity with the price range set in the contract

methods.name: calculateAssetBWithdrawOnAssetADeposit
methods.desc: Calculates how much asset B will be taken from the smart contract on asset A deposit

args.name: inAmount
args.desc: Asset A amount in Base decimal representation.. If asset has 6 decimals, 1 is represented as 1000000000

args.name: assetABalance
args.desc: Asset A balance. Variable ab, in base scale

args.name: assetBBalance
args.desc: Asset B balance. Variable bb, in base scale

args.name: priceMinSqrt
args.desc: sqrt(Min price). Variable pMinS, in base scale

args.name: priceMaxSqrt
args.desc: sqrt(Max price). Variable pMaxS, in base scale

args.name: liqudity
args.desc: sqrt(Max price). Variable L, in base scale

returns.desc: Amount of asset B to be given to the caller before fees. The result is in Base decimals (9)

methods.name: calculateAssetAWithdrawOnAssetBDeposit
methods.desc: Calculates how much asset A will be taken from the smart contract on asset B deposit

args.name: inAmount
args.desc: Asset B amount in Base decimal representation.. If asset has 6 decimals, 1 is represented as 1000000000

args.name: assetABalance
args.desc: Asset A balance. Variable ab, in base scale

args.name: assetBBalance
args.desc: Asset B balance. Variable bb, in base scale

args.name: priceMinSqrt
args.desc: sqrt(Min price). Variable pMinS, in base scale

args.name: priceMaxSqrt
args.desc: sqrt(Max price). Variable pMaxS, in base scale

args.name: liqudity
args.desc: sqrt(Max price). Variable L, in base scale

returns.desc: Amount of asset A to be given to the caller before fees. The result is in Base decimals (9)
